definition.script: node { apiKey="f350b639-e7cc-447b-a830-3737eee4a6c0" productname="java" productversion="0.0.1" def command = 'echo {"apiKey":"' + apiKey + '","checkPolicies":true,"productName":"' + app.code + '","productVer":"' + app.release + '","devDep": "true"} > whitesource.config.json' sh "./command" sh "ls -ltr" sh "cat whitesource.config.json" }
